title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2397 - Electronic Funds Transfer Program For Certain Taxpayers Remitting Taxes Under And Pursuant To The Authority Of Articles 12-a, 13-a, 28 And 29 Of The Tax Law

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
